resources.string:
"~ Ability to promote the value of internal 
" " audit among key employees within the 
" " organization.
" "~ Knowledge in auditing, internal audit
" " standards, fraud awareness, and 
" " professional ethical standards.
" "~ Knowledge in enterprise risk management.
"

" ~ Ability to streamline functions and passion
" " to learn and grow
" "~ Strong interpersonal skills, including 
" " written and communication skills
" "~ Comfort dealing with ambiguity and the
" " ability to work independently
"

" ~ Expertise in theoretical and applied
" " statistics, summary statistics and 
" " hypothesis testing.
" "~ Mathematics which should include linear
" " algebra, calculus and probability
" "~ Proficiency in languages like R, SAS, C, C++,
" " Python, Perl, Java
"

" ~ You must be able to understand written
" " documents.
" "~ You must be able to determine the origin,
" " importance, and condition of materials.
" "~ Organizational skills are important in
" " developing systems for storing materials
" " and making them available to the public.
"

" ~ Social Perceptiveness.
" "~ Reading Comprehension.
" "~ Learning Strategies.
"

" ~ Ability to follow strict deadlines and fast-
" " check information.
" "~ Willing to travel up to 75% of the time.
" "~ Comfortable in front of and behind the
" " camera.
"
" ~ Qualitative Research.\n" "~ Ethical Understanding.\n" "~ Critical Thinking."
"~ Interpersonal skills\n" "~ Emotional stability\n" "~ Knowledge of laws and regulations"
"~ Active Listening\n" "~ Complex Problem Solving\n" "~ Judgment and Decision Making"

" ~ Planning
" "~ Communication
" "~ Decision-making
" "~ Problem-solving
" "~ Human or Interpersonal Skills
"

" ~ Commercial awareness
" "~ Good numerical skills
" "~ Attention to detail
" "~ Analytical skills
" "~ Tact and persuasive ability
" "~ Teamworking skills
"
